doctor.name: Dr. Mohammed Shahabuddin Khaled
doctor.specialty: Burn, Plastic. Cosmetic & Reconstructive Specialist Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammed Shahabuddin Khaled is a Plastic Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Plastic Surgery). He is a Consultant, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammed Shahabuddin Khaled at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 20/B, K. B. Fazlul Kader Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram

doctor.name: Dr. Farhana Akhter
doctor.specialty: Burn, Plastic, Reconstructive, Breast & Cosmetic Surgery Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Farhana Akhter is a Plastic Surgeon in Chittagong. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Plastic Surgery). She is a Consultant, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Farhana Akhter at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong is 2pm to 5pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Kishore Kumar Das
doctor.info: Dr. Kishore Kumar Das is a Plastic Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), FCPS (Surgery), MS (Plastic Surgery). He is working as a Burn, Plastic & Reconstructive Surgeon doctor in Chattogram Maa-O-Shishu Hospital Medical College. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Surgiscope Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Kishore Kumar Das at Surgiscope Hospital, Chittagong is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
